1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Heading of relations
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Rel.Head
6  ( -- * Type
7    Head (..),
8    headExplain,
9  
10    -- * Constructor
11    headOf, headFrom,
12    
13    -- * Selector
14    headEquiv,
15    isSubhead, isSuperhead,
16    headDegree,
17    headNested,
18    headIndex1,
19    headTypes,
20    -- $Selector
21  
22    -- * Add terms
23    headCons,
24    headAppend,
25    headConsNest,
26    headNests,
27  
28    -- * Mapping
29    TypeTerm,
30    headMap,
31    headMapName,
32    headUp,
33    headForward,
34    bodyForward,
35  ) where
36
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
38import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
39import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                   as S
40import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Type           as D
41import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Judge          as D
42import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Rel.TermPicker as D
43
44
45-- ---------------------- Type
46
47-- | Heading of relations.
48data Head =
49    Head { headType :: D.Type
50         } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
51
52instance Monoid Head where
53    mempty = headFrom ([] :: [String])
54    mappend he1 he2 = headOf $ headType he1 `a` headType he2
55        where a (D.TypeRel ts1) (D.TypeRel ts2) = D.TypeRel $ B.unionUp ts1 ts2
56              a _ _ = D.TypeAny
57
58instance D.GetTermNames Head where
59    getTermNames = D.typeRelTermNames . headType
60
61instance B.MixEncode Head where
62    mixEncode = D.typeTermMix . headType
63
64-- | Pretty print head of relation.
65--
66--   >>> headExplain $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
67--   rel /a any
68--       /b any
69--
70headExplain :: Head -> B.Doc
71headExplain = D.typeExplain . headType
72
73
74-- ----------------------  Constructor
75
76-- | Make head of given type..
77headOf :: D.Type -> Head
78headOf ty = Head { headType = ty }
79
80-- | Make head from term names.
81--
82--   >>> headFrom ["a", "b"]
83--   Head { headType = TypeRel [("a", TypeAny), ("b", TypeAny)] }
84--
85--   >>> B.mixEncode $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
86--   MixText "/a /b"
87--
88headFrom :: (S.ToTermName n) => [n] -> Head
89headFrom = headOf . D.typeFlatRel . map S.toTermName
90
91
92-- ----------------------  Selector
93
94-- $Selector
95--
96--  /Examples/
97--
98--  Calculate indices of heading.
99--
100--    >>> let h = headFrom ["a", "b"] in headIndex1 h ["a"]
101--    [0]
102--    >>> let h = headFrom ["a", "b"] in headIndex h [["a"], ["b"], ["c"]]
103--    [[0], [1], [-1]]
104
105-- | Test two heads are equivalent.
106headEquiv :: Head -> Head -> Bool
107headEquiv he1 he2 = ts he1 == ts he2 where
108    ts = B.sort . D.typeRelTermNames . headType
109
110-- | Test heading is subset of another heading.
111--
112--   >>> headFrom ["a", "b"] `isSubhead` headFrom ["a", "b", "c"]
113--   True
114--   >>> headFrom ["a", "e"] `isSubhead` headFrom ["a", "b", "c"]
115--   False
116--
117isSubhead :: Head -> Head -> Bool
118isSubhead he1 he2 = D.getTermNames he1 `B.sublist` D.getTermNames he2
119
120-- | Test heading is superset of another heading.
121isSuperhead :: Head -> Head -> Bool
122isSuperhead he1 he2 = isSubhead he2 he1
123
124-- | Degree of relation, i.e., number of terms.
125--
126--   >>> headDegree $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
127--   2
128--
129headDegree :: Head -> Int
130headDegree = D.typeRelDegree . headType
131
132-- | Index of a term.
133headIndex1 :: Head -> S.TermPath -> [Int]
134headIndex1 = D.typeRelIndex . headType
135
136-- | Select nested terms.
137headNested :: Head -> [(S.TermName, Head)]
138headNested he = ts2 where
139    ts2 = map h $ filter (D.isTypeRel . snd) $ D.typeTerms $ headType he
140    h (n, t) = (n, headOf t)
141
142-- | Get types of relation terms.
143headTypes :: Head -> [D.Type]
144headTypes (Head (D.TypeRel ts)) = map snd ts
145headTypes _ = B.bug "headTypes"
146
147
148-- ----------------------  Add terms
149
150-- | Add term name to head.
151--
152--   >>> headCons "c" $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
153--   Head { headType = TypeRel [("c",TypeAny), ("a",TypeAny), ("b",TypeAny)] }
154--
155headCons :: S.TermName -> O.Map Head
156headCons n1 = headOf . D.typeConsRel n1 . headType
157
158-- | Add term names to head.
159headAppend :: [S.TermName] -> O.Map Head
160headAppend ns1 = headOf . D.typeAppendRel ns1 . headType
161
162-- | Add term name for nested relation.
163headConsNest :: S.TermName -> Head -> O.Map Head
164headConsNest n1 Head { headType = t1 } Head { headType = t } =
165    headOf $ D.typeConsNest n1 t1 t
166
167-- | Create nested relation terms.
168--
169--   >>> headNests ["x", "y"] $ headFrom ["a"]
170--   Head { headType = TypeRel [("x", TypeRel [("a",TypeAny)]), ("y", TypeRel [("a",TypeAny)])] }
171--
172headNests :: [S.TermName] -> O.Map Head
173headNests ns1 Head { headType = t } =
174    headOf $ D.TypeRel $ map nest ns1
175        where nest n = (n, t)
176
177
178-- ----------------------  Mapping
179
180-- | Term whose content is type.
181type TypeTerm = S.Term D.Type
182
183-- | Reconstruct head.
184--
185--   >>> headMap reverse $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
186--   Head {headType = TypeRel [("b",TypeAny),("a",TypeAny)]}
187--
188headMap :: O.Map [TypeTerm] -> O.Map Head
189headMap = headMapBy D.typeRelMapTerms
190
191-- | Convert term names.
192--
193--   >>> headMapName ("x" ++) $ headFrom ["a", "b"]
194--   Head { headType = TypeRel [("xa",TypeAny), ("xb",TypeAny)] }
195--
196headMapName :: O.Map S.TermName -> O.Map Head
197headMapName = headMapBy D.typeRelMapName
198
199headMapBy :: (a -> O.Map D.Type) -> a -> O.Map Head
200headMapBy g f he = headOf $ g f $ headType he
201
202-- | Move up nested relation.
203headUp :: O.Map Head
204headUp = headOf . up . headType where
205    up (D.TypeRel [(_, ty)]) = ty
206    up ty                    = ty
207
208-- | Move terms forward.
209--
210--   >>> headForward ["c"] ["a", "b", "c"] ["x", "y", "z"]
211--   ["z", "y", "x"]
212--
213--   >>> headForward (headFrom ["a", "b"]) (headFrom ["b", "a"]) ["x", "y"]
214--   ["y", "x"]
215--
216headForward :: (D.GetTermNames t1, D.GetTermNames t2) => t1 -> t2 -> O.Map [c]
217headForward to from = D.ssRForward $ D.termPicker to from
218
219-- | Move terms forward.
220bodyForward :: (D.GetTermNames t1, D.GetTermNames t2) => t1 -> t2 -> O.Map [[c]]
221bodyForward to from = (headForward to from <$>)
222
